      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • getAuditorium

        public Auditorium getAuditorium(java.lang.String name)
        This method returns a object auditorium with the attribute of the parameter of the array auditoriums.
        Pre: The array auditoriums need to exists.
        Parameters:
        name - Need to be a String valid name !=null
        Returns:
        An Auditorium or null, if the Auditorium is in the array.

      • addEvent

        public java.lang.String addEvent(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime startDate,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime finalDate,
                                 java.lang.String teacher,
                                 java.lang.String faculty,
                                 int[] NumAuditoriums)
        This method checks if the event was created before, and if it wasn't then create the event
        Parameters:
        name - is a string with the events name, name != null
        startDate - is a LocalDateTime object that contains the date and the hour of start of the event, startDate != null, startDate needs to be a LocalDateTime object
        finalDate - is a LocalDateTime object that contains the date and the hour of end of the event, startDate != null, finalDate needs to be a LocalDateTime object
        teacher - is a string that contains the name of the teacher
        faculty - is a string that contains the name of the faculty
        NumAuditoriums - is a array with the indicator of the auditoriums that the event will use
        Returns:
        a string that indicates if the event was created or not

      • eraseEvent

        public java.lang.String eraseEvent(java.lang.String name)
        This method use the name of a event to erase the event

        Pre:

        The arrayList events need to be created before

        Post:

        The Event object corresponding to the name will erased to the arrayList
        Parameters:
        name - is a string with the name of the event
        Returns:
        a string indicating if the event was erased correctly or not

      • showEventsNextFiveDays

        public java.lang.String showEventsNextFiveDays()
        This method put in a string the information of the events in the next 5 days

        Pre:

        The arrayList events need to be created before
        Returns:
        a string with the information of the events

      • createChair

        public void createChair(int auditorium,
                        int rows,
                        int maxColums,
                        int[] colums)
        This method calls another method of the auditorium to continue with the request

        Pre:

        The array auditoriums need to be created before, auditoriums != null
        Parameters:
        auditorium - is a integer that indicates the auditorium
        rows - is a integer that indicates the number of rows
        maxColums - is a integer that indicates the maximum number of columns
        colums - is a array that contains the number of chairs per row

      • showAuditoriums

        public java.lang.String showAuditoriums()
        This method returns a string with the auditoriums in the university

        Pre:

        The array auditoriums need to be created before, auditoriums != null
        Returns:
        a string with the number and the name of the auditoriums in the university

      • reportDefectiveChair

        public java.lang.String reportDefectiveChair(int auditorium,
                                             char row,
                                             int chair,
                                             java.lang.String description)
        This method calls another method in Auditorium that continues with the request

        Pre:

        The array auditoriums need to be created before, auditoriums != null
        Parameters:
        auditorium - is a integer that indicates the auditorium
        row - is a char that indicates the row
        chair - is a integer that indicates the defective chair in the row
        description - is a string that contains the description about the defective chair
        Returns:
        a string indicating if the chair was reported correctly or not

      • checkHour

        public boolean checkHour(int[] NumAuditoriums,
                         java.time.LocalDateTime startDate,
                         java.time.LocalDateTime finalDate)
        This method checks if exist another event that could stay in the time range of the actual event

        Pre:

        The array auditoriums need to be created before, auditoriums != null

        Pre:

        The arrayList events need to be created before
        Parameters:
        NumAuditoriums - is a integer that contains a indication of the auditoriums that the event will use
        startDate - is a LocalDateTime object that contains the date and the hour of start of the event, startDate != null, startDate needs to be a LocalDateTime object
        finalDate - is a LocalDateTime object that contains the date and the hour of end of the event, startDate != null, finalDate needs to be a LocalDateTime object
        Returns:
        a boolean that returns true if the range of time is available, or false if another event is in the range

      • calculatePercentageDefectiveChairs

        public java.lang.String calculatePercentageDefectiveChairs(int auditorium)
        This method calls another method in auditorium that continues with the request

        Pre:

        The array auditoriums need to be created before, auditoriums != null
        Parameters:
        auditorium - is a integer that indicates the auditorium
        Returns:
        a string with the percentage of defective chair in the auditorium
